dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2349 IH: To ensure receipt of all health insurance benefits to which a member of a union is entitled.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grayson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To ensure receipt of all health insurance benefits to which a member of a union is entitled.

section.header: GUARANTEED RECIPROCITY OF ALL MONIES DESIGNATED FOR HEALTH INSURANCE BENEFITS REGARDLESS OF PLACE OF EMPLOYMENT
section.text: For the purpose of collective bargaining agreements, all monies designated for health insurance plans or funds shall be, without exception, fully reciprocated to a workerâ€™s home health plan or fund.
